short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Maximize your day to day productivity by focusing on One Big Thing at a time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Feeling overwhelmed by the tasks you to deal with?  Don't create a never ending todo list.  Focus on one big thing for the day and do it well.
